alert.note: Alert for Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 2:59PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Moffat and east central Uintah Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 258 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Dinosaur, or 23 miles east of Vernal, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Moffat and east central Uintah Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
